message.content:
When you were 6 and your sister was half your age, she was 3 years younger than you (6 / 2 = 3). Since then, you have aged 74 more years (80 - 6 = 74), so your sister has also aged 74 more years. To find her current age, we need to subtract the difference in ages from when you were 6:

Your sister's current age is 3 + 74 = 77 years old.
